Title: Authorizes the public to participate in public meetings in person or remotely
Summary: Authorizes the public to participate in public meetings in person or remotely through the use of a telephone conference, a video conference, and/or other similar technology.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L; amd ยง50, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the public buildings law, in relation to authorizing the public to participate in public meetings in person or remotely
